short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that adds a link to download your child's photos from Storypark.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Want a way of downloading your child's photos from Storypark? If you are tech savy then you may know about developer tools and how to find the source URL in the underlying HTML. You can download them using this URL but it is tedious.

Storypark Image Grabber will first add a link on each post in the activity view which will open it in a new tab (so you don't loose your place in the infinite scroll). Then on the post it will add a link to the top right corner of each image and when you click it, it will start downloading the image in the background without having to leave the page.
